      • setupStage

        private void setupStage()
        Performs preliminary setup of the primary stage for the GUI Application Instantiates a GridPane object and adds the game elements to the board in their corresponding positions. Sets the gridPane event handler to detect the x-location templated to handle the corresponding events.

      • clearGridPane

        private void clearGridPane()
        This method sets the color of all circles in the gridPane back to white.

      • createGridPane

        private void createGridPane()
        Sets up a GridPane object with the corresponding components and handlers.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Method called by the Observable to update the Observers with the corresponding parameters. If an int[] is provided, parses the row, col coordinates to insert a token of a given color into the board.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
